scoring_classifiers module¶

This module is used to a lot of stuff

scoring_classifiers.compute_scores(train_data, lst_pipes, cv)¶

This function is useful to compare the performance of different classifiers according to the following scoring metrics: precision,recall,f1 score, roc auc, accuracy. A CV is carried out and then all the informations for each split are saved into a pandas DataFrame.

train_data: DataFrame

The training dataset

lst_pipe: list of Pipeline

Each element of this list is a different Pipeline

cv: CV

The cross validation parameters

df: DataFrame A pandas Dataframe containing the result of the cross validation.

Bagging and boosting for financial machine learning
